name: Animal Island
description:
Animal Island is an entertaining game for the whole family especially for children who like to play!

this island brings 5 Super hilarious minigames to spend entertaining time playing

Everyone likes a good memory game, these games this island has, "Ayuda a Juancho el cangrejo a encontrar a sus amigos."

with Animal Island you will have to no longer play with your little siblings or your little cousins, just put them to play Animal Island and see how you will be free to do anything.
